Posts.Content: Hi, I opted for mastectomy with immediate silicon reconstruction. It’s been 4 weeks since surgery and I have recovered well. The first week is a bit painful and uncomfortable but from the 2nd week onwards I had stopped taking any pain medication also. With clothes on no one can tell the difference and I am happy with my decision
